attributes.value: japanese role-playing game, adventure game, strategy video game

knowledge_panel.description: dragon quest viii: journey of the cursed king is a role-playing video game developed by level-5 and published by square enix for the playstation 2. it was released in japan in 2004, in north america in 2005 and pal regions in 2006, making it the first main series installment released in the pal region. wikipedia
